message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be very interested in. It's valued at $15,000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $9,000.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and understand your offer. While $9,000 is a good starting point, it's still a bit below what I need to make this work. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?  This would be a fair compromise that allows both of us to walk away happy.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm sticking with my offer of $9,000. This is a fair price, considering the value we both place on the product. I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this price.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 simply doesn't work for me. This product is worth significantly more than that, and I've already made a substantial concession.  I'm willing to come down to $10,000, but that's my final offer. If you're truly interested in acquiring this product, I suggest you reconsider. Otherwise, I'll be moving on to other potential buyers.

Alice, I understand your position, but $10,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's my final offer. I've been very open to negotiating, and I believe this is a fair price for both of us. I'm not going to be able to go any higher. If you're not willing to consider this, I'll have to explore other options.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $9,500 is still too far below my minimum.  I've already made significant concessions, and I'm at a point where I need to be compensated fairly for the value of this product. I'm willing to consider a final offer of $10,250.  This reflects the market value and acknowledges your interest in acquiring this unique product. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.

Alice, I understand your perspective, but $10,250 is still outside of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers at $9,875.  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to walk away with a positive outcome.  I'm confident that this is the best deal we can reach, and I'm hoping you'll consider it.
